27#include "hb-shaper-impl.hh"
28
29#ifndef HB_NO_FALLBACK_SHAPE
30
31/*
32 * shaper face data
33 */
34
35struct hb_fallback_face_data_t {};
36
37hb_fallback_face_data_t *
38_hb_fallback_shaper_face_data_create (hb_face_t *face HB_UNUSED)
39{
40 return (hb_fallback_face_data_t *) HB_SHAPER_DATA_SUCCEEDED;
41}
42
43void
44_hb_fallback_shaper_face_data_destroy (hb_fallback_face_data_t *data HB_UNUSED)
45{
46}
47
48
49/*
50 * shaper font data
51 */
52
53struct hb_fallback_font_data_t {};
54
55hb_fallback_font_data_t *
56_hb_fallback_shaper_font_data_create (hb_font_t *font HB_UNUSED)
57{
58 return (hb_fallback_font_data_t *) HB_SHAPER_DATA_SUCCEEDED;
59}
60
61void
62_hb_fallback_shaper_font_data_destroy (hb_fallback_font_data_t *data HB_UNUSED)
63{
64}
65
66
67/*
68 * shaper
69 */
70
71hb_bool_t
72_hb_fallback_shape (hb_shape_plan_t *shape_plan HB_UNUSED,
73 hb_font_t *font,
74 hb_buffer_t *buffer,
75 const hb_feature_t *features HB_UNUSED,
76 unsigned int num_features HB_UNUSED)
77{
78 hb_codepoint_t space;
79 bool has_space = (bool) font->get_nominal_glyph (unicode: ' ', glyph: &space);
80
81 buffer->clear_positions ();
82
83 hb_direction_t direction = buffer->props.direction;
84 hb_unicode_funcs_t *unicode = buffer->unicode;
85 unsigned int count = buffer->len;
86 hb_glyph_info_t *info = buffer->info;
87 hb_glyph_position_t *pos = buffer->pos;
88 for (unsigned int i = 0; i < count; i++)
89 {
90 if (has_space && unicode->is_default_ignorable (ch: info[i].codepoint)) {
91 info[i].codepoint = space;
92 pos[i].x_advance = 0;
93 pos[i].y_advance = 0;
94 continue;
95 }
96 (void) font->get_nominal_glyph (unicode: info[i].codepoint, glyph: &info[i].codepoint);
97 font->get_glyph_advance_for_direction (glyph: info[i].codepoint,
98 direction,
99 x: &pos[i].x_advance,
100 y: &pos[i].y_advance);
101 font->subtract_glyph_origin_for_direction (glyph: info[i].codepoint,
102 direction,
103 x: &pos[i].x_offset,
104 y: &pos[i].y_offset);
105 }
106
107 if (HB_DIRECTION_IS_BACKWARD (direction))
108 hb_buffer_reverse (buffer);
109
110 buffer->clear_glyph_flags ();
111
112 return true;
113}
114
115#endif
